title: Premium Luxury 635 Sq Ft, 1 Bed / 1 Bath in Arlington Heights

Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Available in select buildings.', 'We charge a $350 fee per pet.', 'We also charge $35 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Weight restriction: up to 100 lbs on the first floor.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C3867A60319D4A']
